mapper.sql: uuid, url, name, domain_two.column, type, rank, incidence, weight, maintenance_status, father_uuid, update_time

order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into domain_two (uuid, url, name, domain_two.column, type, rank, incidence, weight, maintenance_status, father_uuid, update_time) values (#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{column,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incidence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maintenanceStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, #{fatherUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
